result.reason: Feature request for OTP support has no body - need details on which protocols (SSH, RDP, VNC?), OTP type (TOTP/HOTP), and whether this means storing OTP seeds or prompting at connect time
result.approach: Needs clarification before scoping: if TOTP, add seed storage to ConnectionInfo + generate codes at connect time using a TOTP library; if prompt-based, add a pre-connect OTP dialog
